devdoc.author: Olawale Olatunji Bright
devdoc.details: A secure blockchain-based voting system with biometric verification

castVote(bytes32,bytes32,string,string).details: Cast a vote in the current election

params._candidateId: ID of the candidate being voted for
params._pollingUnitId: Polling unit where vote is cast
params._verificationHash: Hash combining NIN, BVN, and biometric data

returns._0: uint256 Current election ID (0 if none active)

getElectionCandidateResults(uint256).details: Get all candidate IDs and their vote counts for an election

returns.voteCounts: Array of vote counts corresponding to candidateIds

returns._0: uint256 Vote count for the candidate
uint256 Number of votes recorded at the polling unit

getTotalElections().details: Get total number of elections created

getTotalVotes().details: Get total number of votes cast

getVoteDetails(uint256).details: Get vote details by vote ID

getVotesByTimeRange(uint256,uint256).details: Get votes cast in a time range

hasVoterVoted(bytes32).details: Check if a voter has already voted

returns._0: bool Whether the voter has voted

invalidateVote(uint256,string).details: Invalidate a specific vote and adjust tallies

isTerminalAuthorized(address).details: Check if a terminal is authorized

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerCandidate(uint256,string).details: Register a single candidate for a given election (before it starts)

registerCandidates(uint256,string[]).details: Register multiple candidates for a given election (before it starts)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
